H

handleReplenishRequests() - Static method in class HMS.Systems.StockSystem
Handles the approval or rejection of a replenish request Prompts the admin to select a request and approve or reject it.
HMS - package HMS
This is the main package of the project.
HMS - Class in HMS
Hospital Management System (HMS) that manages user login, patient registration, and user HMS.data persistence.
HMS() - Constructor for class HMS.HMS
 
HMS.Enums - package HMS.Enums
This package contains enumerations used throughout the application for representing fixed values.
HMS.Menus - package HMS.Menus
This package contains classes responsible for displaying different menus based on user roles and handling user input in a terminal-based menu system.
HMS.Models - package HMS.Models
This package contains the core data models representing the entities in the application, such as users, appointments, and medications.
HMS.Systems - package HMS.Systems
This package contains utitlity classes that manages System logic and store temporary data during run time for fast retrieval and usage.
HMS.Users - package HMS.Users
This package contains classes that represent the user types in the HMS.
